name: The Death Zone
description:
Controls:

Q W E R for casting skills. Click to target either on the mountain or on the side list. Use the weather sliders to change the effectiveness of your skills.

---

You are a mountain. You loathe these throngs of humans climbing you endlessly, littering your beautiful slopes.... Use your abilities and KILL THEM ALL before they reach back to camp.

---

WeeklyGameJam - week 150

Theme: "You're the enemy"

---

Music: www.bensound.com
